text: A spaniel is a type of gun dog. Spaniels were especially bred in the 1700's in Great Britain to flush game birds out of thick bushesGoodall and Gasow, The New Complete English Springer Spaniel, 1984. There are many types of spaniel dogs, the most popular ones are the Cocker Spaniel, the English Springer Spaniel, the Field Spaniel and the Welsh Springer Spaniel. ==Types of Spaniel== ===Recent
